name: Playground Realtalk
description:
Upon arriving to a new school, you face a bully who's very selfish and keeps all the equipment to himself and his crew. Explore the playground and build new friendships or beat old records while you learn new insults to beat your bully in a game of Playground Realtalk.

This game is inspired by the "Sly 3: Thieves Among Us" quest where you trash talk a parrot pirate.
